alert.note: Alert for Macomb; Oakland; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Wayne, southeastern Oakland and Macomb Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 100 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rochester to near Pontiac to near Northville. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Birmingham and Rochester around 105 PM EDT. Troy, Southfield, Sterling Heights, Royal Oak and Detroit Zoo around 110 PM EDT. Warren, Clinton and Macomb Township around 115 PM EDT. Mount Clemens, Detroit and Dearborn around 120 PM EDT. St. Clair Shores and New Baltimore around 125 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Franklin, Roseville, Shelby Township, Utica, Washington, Lathrup Village, Bingham Farms, Farmington Hills, Pleasant Ridge and Westland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan.
